trans-unit.source: Tutorial: Azure Active Directory integration with Cornerstone OnDemand | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: Tutorial: Azure Active Directory integration with Cornerstone OnDemand | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: Learn how to use Cornerstone OnDemand with Azure Active Directory to enable single sign-on, automated provisioning, and more!.
trans-unit.target: Learn how to use Cornerstone OnDemand with Azure Active Directory to enable single sign-on, automated provisioning, and more!.

trans-unit.source: Tutorial: Azure Active Directory integration with Cornerstone OnDemand
trans-unit.target: Tutorial: Azure Active Directory integration with Cornerstone OnDemand

trans-unit.source: [AZURE.TIP]For feedback, click [here](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=526246).
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.TIP]For feedback, click [here](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=526246).

trans-unit.source: The objective of this tutorial is to show the integration of Azure and Cornerstone OnDemand.
trans-unit.target: The objective of this tutorial is to show the integration of Azure and Cornerstone OnDemand.

trans-unit.source: The scenario outlined in this tutorial assumes that you already have the following items:
trans-unit.target: The scenario outlined in this tutorial assumes that you already have the following items:

trans-unit.source: A valid Azure subscription
trans-unit.target: A valid Azure subscription

trans-unit.source: A Cornerstone OnDemand tenant
trans-unit.target: A Cornerstone OnDemand tenant

trans-unit.source: After completing this tutorial, the Azure AD users you have assigned to Cornerstone OnDemand will be able to single sign into the application at your Cornerstone OnDemand company site (service provider initiated sign on), or using the [Introduction to the Access Panel](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/dn308586)
trans-unit.target: After completing this tutorial, the Azure AD users you have assigned to Cornerstone OnDemand will be able to single sign into the application at your Cornerstone OnDemand company site (service provider initiated sign on), or using the [Introduction to the Access Panel](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/dn308586)

trans-unit.source: The scenario outlined in this tutorial consists of the following building blocks:
trans-unit.target: The scenario outlined in this tutorial consists of the following building blocks:

trans-unit.source: Enabling the application integration for Cornerstone OnDemand
trans-unit.target: Enabling the application integration for Cornerstone OnDemand

trans-unit.source: Configuring single sign-on
trans-unit.target: Configuring single sign-on

trans-unit.source: Configuring user provisioning
trans-unit.target: Configuring user provisioning

trans-unit.source: Assigning users
trans-unit.target: Assigning users

trans-unit.source: Scenario
trans-unit.target: Scenario

trans-unit.source: Enabling the application integration for Cornerstone OnDemand
trans-unit.target: Enabling the application integration for Cornerstone OnDemand

trans-unit.source: The objective of this section is to outline how to enable the application integration for Cornerstone OnDemand.
trans-unit.target: The objective of this section is to outline how to enable the application integration for Cornerstone OnDemand.

trans-unit.source: To enable the application integration for Cornerstone OnDemand, perform the following steps:
trans-unit.target: To enable the application integration for Cornerstone OnDemand, perform the following steps:

trans-unit.source: In the Azure Management Portal, on the left navigation pane, click **Active Directory**.
trans-unit.target: In the Azure Management Portal, on the left navigation pane, click **Active Directory**.

trans-unit.source: Active Directory
trans-unit.target: Active Directory

trans-unit.source: From the **Directory** list, select the directory for which you want to enable directory integration.
trans-unit.target: From the **Directory** list, select the directory for which you want to enable directory integration.

trans-unit.source: To open the applications view, in the directory view, click **Applications** in the top menu.
trans-unit.target: To open the applications view, in the directory view, click **Applications** in the top menu.

trans-unit.source: Applications
trans-unit.target: Applications

trans-unit.source: Click **Add** at the bottom of the page.
trans-unit.target: Click **Add** at the bottom of the page.

trans-unit.source: Add application
trans-unit.target: Add application

trans-unit.source: On the **What do you want to do** dialog, click **Add an application from the gallery**.
trans-unit.target: On the **What do you want to do** dialog, click **Add an application from the gallery**.

trans-unit.source: Add an application from gallerry
trans-unit.target: Add an application from gallerry

trans-unit.source: In the **search box**, type **cornerstone ondemand**.
trans-unit.target: In the **search box**, type **cornerstone ondemand**.

trans-unit.source: Application Gallery
trans-unit.target: Application Gallery

trans-unit.source: In the results pane, select **Cornerstone OnDemand**, and then click **Complete** to add the application.
trans-unit.target: In the results pane, select **Cornerstone OnDemand**, and then click **Complete** to add the application.

trans-unit.source: Cornerstone OnDemand
trans-unit.target: Cornerstone OnDemand

trans-unit.source: Configuring single sign-on
trans-unit.target: Configuring single sign-on

trans-unit.source: The objective of this section is to outline how to enable users to authenticate to Cornerstone OnDemand with their account in Azure AD using federation based on the SAML protocol.
trans-unit.target: The objective of this section is to outline how to enable users to authenticate to Cornerstone OnDemand with their account in Azure AD using federation based on the SAML protocol.

trans-unit.source: To configure single sign-on, perform the following steps:
trans-unit.target: To configure single sign-on, perform the following steps:

trans-unit.source: In the Azure AD portal, on the **Cornerstone OnDemand** application integration page, click **Configure single sign-on** to open the **Configure Single Sign On ** dialog.
trans-unit.target: In the Azure AD portal, on the **Cornerstone OnDemand** application integration page, click **Configure single sign-on** to open the **Configure Single Sign On ** dialog.

trans-unit.source: Enable Single Sign-On
trans-unit.target: Enable Single Sign-On

trans-unit.source: On the **How would you like users to sign on to Cornerstone OnDemand** page, select **Microsoft Azure AD Single Sign-On**, and then click **Next**.
trans-unit.target: On the **How would you like users to sign on to Cornerstone OnDemand** page, select **Microsoft Azure AD Single Sign-On**, and then click **Next**.

trans-unit.source: Microsoft Azure AD Single Sign-On
trans-unit.target: Microsoft Azure AD Single Sign-On

trans-unit.source: On the **Configure App URL** page, in the **Cornerstone OnDemand Sign In URL** textbox, type your URL using the following pattern "*http://company.csod.com*", and then click **Next**.
trans-unit.target: On the **Configure App URL** page, in the **Cornerstone OnDemand Sign In URL** textbox, type your URL using the following pattern "*http://company.csod.com*", and then click **Next**.

trans-unit.source: Configure App URL
trans-unit.target: Configure App URL

trans-unit.source: On the **Configure single sign-on at Cornerstone OnDemand** page, to download your certificate, click **Download certificate**, and then save the certificate file locally on your computer.
trans-unit.target: On the **Configure single sign-on at Cornerstone OnDemand** page, to download your certificate, click **Download certificate**, and then save the certificate file locally on your computer.

trans-unit.source: Configure Single Sign-On
trans-unit.target: Configure Single Sign-On

trans-unit.source: Send the following items to the Cornerstone OnDemand support team:
trans-unit.target: Send the following items to the Cornerstone OnDemand support team:

trans-unit.source: The downloaded certificate
trans-unit.target: The downloaded certificate

trans-unit.source: The **Remote Login URL** value
trans-unit.target: The **Remote Login URL** value

trans-unit.source: The **Remote Logout URL** value.
trans-unit.target: The **Remote Logout URL** value.

trans-unit.source: [AZURE.NOTE] Single Sign-On needs to be configured by the Cornerstone OnDemand support team.
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.NOTE] Single Sign-On needs to be configured by the Cornerstone OnDemand support team.

trans-unit.source: You will get a notification from the support team when the configuration has been completed.
trans-unit.target: You will get a notification from the support team when the configuration has been completed.

trans-unit.source: Select the single sign-on configuration confirmation, and then click **Complete** to close the **Configure Single Sign On** dialog.
trans-unit.target: Select the single sign-on configuration confirmation, and then click **Complete** to close the **Configure Single Sign On** dialog.

trans-unit.source: Configure Single Sign-On
trans-unit.target: Configure Single Sign-On

trans-unit.source: Configuring user provisioning
trans-unit.target: Configuring user provisioning

trans-unit.source: In order to enable Azure AD users to log into Cornerstone OnDemand, they must be provisioned into Cornerstone OnDemand.
trans-unit.target: In order to enable Azure AD users to log into Cornerstone OnDemand, they must be provisioned into Cornerstone OnDemand.

trans-unit.source: In the case of Cornerstone OnDemand, provisioning is a manual task.
trans-unit.target: In the case of Cornerstone OnDemand, provisioning is a manual task.

trans-unit.source: To configure user provisioning, perform the following steps:
trans-unit.target: To configure user provisioning, perform the following steps:

trans-unit.source: Send the information (e.g.: Name, Emial) about the Azure AD user you want to provision to the Cornerstone OnDemand support team.
trans-unit.target: Send the information (e.g.: Name, Emial) about the Azure AD user you want to provision to the Cornerstone OnDemand support team.

trans-unit.source: [AZURE.NOTE] You can use any other Cornerstone OnDemand user account creation tools or APIs provided by Cornerstone OnDemand to provision AAD user accounts.
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.NOTE] You can use any other Cornerstone OnDemand user account creation tools or APIs provided by Cornerstone OnDemand to provision AAD user accounts.

trans-unit.source: Assigning users
trans-unit.target: Assigning users

trans-unit.source: To test your configuration, you need to grant the Azure AD users you want to allow using your application access to it by assigning them.
trans-unit.target: To test your configuration, you need to grant the Azure AD users you want to allow using your application access to it by assigning them.

trans-unit.source: To assign users to Cornerstone OnDemand, perform the following steps:
trans-unit.target: To assign users to Cornerstone OnDemand, perform the following steps:

trans-unit.source: In the Azure AD portal, create a test account.
trans-unit.target: In the Azure AD portal, create a test account.

trans-unit.source: On the **Cornerstone OnDemand **application integration page, click **Assign users**.
trans-unit.target: On the **Cornerstone OnDemand **application integration page, click **Assign users**.

trans-unit.source: Assign users
trans-unit.target: Assign users

trans-unit.source: Select your test user, click **Assign**, and then click **Yes** to confirm your assignment.
trans-unit.target: Select your test user, click **Assign**, and then click **Yes** to confirm your assignment.

trans-unit.source: Assign Users
trans-unit.target: Assign Users

trans-unit.source: If you want to test your single sign-on settings, open the Access Panel.
trans-unit.target: If you want to test your single sign-on settings, open the Access Panel.

trans-unit.source: For more details about the Access Panel, see [Introduction to the Access Panel](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/dn308586).
trans-unit.target: For more details about the Access Panel, see [Introduction to the Access Panel](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/dn308586).

trans-unit.source: test
trans-unit.target: test
